data.name: Abrade
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
data.flavor_text: The Falkenrath progenitor was a vicious falconer, and the line is quick to remind others of its heritage.

data.name: Adamant Will
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
data.flavor_text: "I refuse to die before I see the sun rise again."

data.name: Aim for the Head
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile target Zombie.
• Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Works every time."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

data.name: Alchemist's Retrieval
data.oracle_text:
Cleave {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Return target nonland permanent [you control] to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: To most, a terrifying apparition. To a necro-alchemist, a potent fuel source.

data.name: Ancestral Anger
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Ancestral Anger in your graveyard.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "One vampire for every family member I've lost."

data.name: Apprentice Sharpshooter
data.oracle_text:
Reach
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
data.flavor_text: Innistrad's best archers are trained by the Quiver of Kessig, an order of cathars who specialize in ranged combat.

data.name: Belligerent Guest
data.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Belligerent Guest deals combat damage to a player, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card_faces.name: Binding Geist
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever Binding Geist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
Disturb {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)

card_faces.name: Spectral Binding
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.
If Spectral Binding would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

data.name: Bleed Dry
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Wipe your chin, child. We can't have Olivia thinking we're uncivilized."
—Anje Falkenrath

data.name: Bloodcrazed Socialite
data.oracle_text:
Menace
When Bloodcrazed Socialite enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever Bloodcrazed Socialite attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood token. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

data.name: Blood Fountain
data.oracle_text:
When Blood Fountain enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blood Fountain: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Blood Petal Celebrant
data.oracle_text:
Blood Petal Celebrant has first strike as long as it's attacking.
When Blood Petal Celebrant dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

data.name: Blood Servitor
data.oracle_text: When Blood Servitor enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text:
"Please, my friends, help yourselves to the help."
—Olivia Voldaren

data.name: Bloody Betrayal
data.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

data.name: Bramble Armor
data.oracle_text:
When Bramble Armor enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

data.name: Ceremonial Knife
data.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, create a Blood token." (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

data.name: Chill of the Grave
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Zombie.
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Frozen is frozen, whether it's with cold, terror, or both.

data.name: Courier Bat
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Courier Bat enters the battlefield, if you gained life this turn, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Swarms of bats poured from Lurenbraum Fortress carrying wedding invitations to vampires of every bloodline.

data.name: Cradle of Safety
data.oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature you control
When Cradle of Safety enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

data.name: Cruel Witness
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"I escaped, so why do I still feel like I'm being watched?"
—Gregel, militia leader

data.name: Crushing Canopy
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
data.flavor_text:
"The forests of this world are unafraid to assert themselves."
—Wrenn

data.name: Dawnhart Disciple
data.oracle_text: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, Dawnhart Disciple gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Our coven finds strength in nature and purpose in serving our communities."

data.name: Daybreak Combatants
data.oracle_text:
Haste
When Daybreak Combatants enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: After weeks of unending darkness, a glimpse of dawn was all the people of Stensia needed to rekindle their will to fight.

data.name: Desperate Farmer // Depraved Harvester
data.type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Knight

card_faces.name: Desperate Farmer
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When another creature you control dies, transform Desperate Farmer.
card_faces.flavor_text: A tragic moment pushed him to a blasphemous act.

card_faces.name: Depraved Harvester
card_faces.oracle_text: Lifelink
card_faces.flavor_text: Once he'd tasted that dark power, there was no turning back.

data.name: Diregraf Scavenger
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Diregraf Scavenger enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: It can barely feel the sword anymore.

data.name: Doomed Dissenter
data.oracle_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
data.flavor_text: The most dangerous place to be in Kessig is alone.

data.name: Dreadlight Monstrosity
data.oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
{3}{U}{U}: Dreadlight Monstrosity can't be blocked this turn. Activate only if you own a card in exile.

card_faces.name: Drogskol Infantry
card_faces.oracle_text: Disturb {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: He swore to protect the Moorlands. A little thing like death was no excuse to break his oath.

card_faces.name: Drogskol Armaments
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
If Drogskol Armaments would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: When he could no longer carry on, he imparted his strength to the one who took up his duty.

data.name: End the Festivities
data.oracle_text: End the Festivities deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
data.flavor_text: When the defenses around Lurenbraum Fortress faltered, the Crimson Ballroom received some unexpected guests.

data.name: Estwald Shieldbasher
data.oracle_text: Whenever Estwald Shieldbasher attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
data.flavor_text: The door to her home survived the fires of the Malignus. Now it's her greatest weapon.

data.name: Evolving Wilds
data.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
data.flavor_text:
"Spend too much time scanning the shadows for evil and you'll never see the beauty our world has to offer."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

data.name: Falkenrath Celebrants
data.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Falkenrath Celebrants enters the battlefield, create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card_faces.name: Fearful Villager
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: When Harold ran from the wolves, the others called him a coward.

card_faces.name: Fearsome Werewolf
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Come nightfall, they were the ones fleeing in terror.

data.name: Fear of Death
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Fear of Death enters the battlefield, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

data.name: Fierce Retribution
data.oracle_text:
Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Destroy target [attacking] creature.
data.flavor_text: "It won't bring them back, but it will bring me peace."

data.name: Flame-Blessed Bolt
data.oracle_text: Flame-Blessed Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"I noticed you were short on party favors, so I brought my own."
—Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

data.name: Flourishing Hunter
data.oracle_text: When Flourishing Hunter enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to the greatest toughness among other creatures you control.
data.flavor_text:
"I would welcome her into my pack with honor."
—Arlinn Kord

data.name: Gift of Fangs
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Vampire. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.
data.flavor_text:
"You are one of the few to whom we offer our blessing. What fool would reject immortality?"
—Runo Stromkirk

data.name: Gluttonous Guest
data.oracle_text:
When Gluttonous Guest enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you gain 1 life.

data.name: Grisly Ritual
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text:
"You can always tell who's new from the screaming."
—Tinua, Skirsdag cultist

data.name: Gryff Rider
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
data.flavor_text:
"Keep your heels down and bend at the hips as your mount takes flight. She'll do the rest."
—Anders, cathar drillmaster

data.name: Heron-Blessed Geist
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{W}, Exile Heron-Blessed Geist from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Activate only if you control an enchantment and only as a sorcery.

data.oracle_text:
Flying
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
{1}{W}: Heron of Hope gains lifelink until end of turn.

data.name: Honored Heirloom
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
data.flavor_text: After the Travails, Runechanters set about repairing twisted symbols of Avacyn as the first step in restoring faith in the Church.

card_faces.name: Hookhand Mariner
card_faces.oracle_text: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: The local gossips swore Nesmith lost his hands in a fight with a werewolf.

card_faces.name: Riphook Raider
card_faces.oracle_text:
Riphook Raider can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)

data.name: Hungry Ridgewolf
data.oracle_text: As long as you control another Wolf or Werewolf, Hungry Ridgewolf gets +1/+0 and has trample.
data.flavor_text: Even vampires know to travel faster when they hear howling in the Geier Reach passes.

data.name: Kessig Flamebreather
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Kessig Flamebreather deals 1 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: "Hunter's fire" was meant for slaying monsters in the Ulvenwald, but that never stopped Ralen from showing it off.

card_faces.name: Kindly Ancestor
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Disturb {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
If Ancestor's Embrace would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Thank you, Grandmother. I love you too."

data.name: Lacerate Flesh
data.oracle_text: Lacerate Flesh deals 4 damage to target creature. Create a number of Blood tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt to that creature this way. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card_faces.name: Lantern Bearer
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Disturb {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Val didn't know what the silent geist was offering . . .

card_faces.name: Lanterns' Lift
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
If Lanterns' Lift would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . but she knew it would be rude to refuse.

data.name: Lightning Wolf
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}: Lightning Wolf gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: These thick-furred wolves have adapted to Stensia's storms, channeling their energy into bursts of supernatural speed.

data.name: Massive Might
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Run! It's coming for us! Eventually!"
—Yaster, Havengul shopkeeper

data.name: Militia Rallier
data.oracle_text:
Militia Rallier can't attack alone.
Whenever Militia Rallier attacks, untap target creature.
data.flavor_text: "We can wait like helpless children for a hero, or we can gather our courage and *be* the heroes. Who's with me?"

data.name: Mindleech Ghoul
data.oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Mindleech Ghoul exploits a creature, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
data.flavor_text:
"This still doesn't make you the brains of the operation."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

data.name: Moldgraf Millipede
data.oracle_text: When Moldgraf Millipede enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on Moldgraf Millipede for each creature card in your graveyard. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text: Between stitchers, cultists, and scavengers, corpses are in high demand.

data.name: Mulch
data.oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"Tread carefully. You remember what happened in the last quiet, peaceful clearing."
—Halana, to Alena

data.name: Nature's Embrace
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature or land
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+2.
As long as enchanted permanent is a land, it has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

data.name: Nebelgast Beguiler
data.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: A moment of distraction, an hour off course.

data.name: Nurturing Presence
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
When Nurturing Presence enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

data.name: Parish-Blade Trainee
data.oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Parish-Blade Trainee dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: The recruits trained in eternal night, fueled by the hope that they might one day see the sun again.

data.name: Persistent Specimen
data.oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Persistent Specimen from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
data.flavor_text:
"The jaw bone's connected to the skull bone. The skull bone's connected to the . . . uh . . . hook thingy."
—Garl, sticher's assistant

data.name: Piercing Light
data.oracle_text: Piercing Light deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text:
"Creatures of the night dissolve like shadows in the light of faith."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

data.name: Pointed Discussion
data.oracle_text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: Small talk is a dying art.

data.name: Pyre Spawn
data.oracle_text: When Pyre Spawn dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Memories of the Harvesttide tragedy festered until they grew into an incarnate rage that set the world ablaze.

data.name: Ragged Recluse // Odious Witch
data.type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Warlock

card_faces.name: Ragged Recluse
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you discarded a card this turn, transform Ragged Recluse.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Forgive my manners. It's been so long since I had a guest for dinner."

card_faces.name: Odious Witch
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever Odious Witch attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Her cauldron refilled, she settled in to wait for the next unsuspecting traveler to knock at her door.

data.name: Reckless Impulse
data.oracle_text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
data.flavor_text: A stitcher looks at their creation and sees the result of years of study and hours of toil. A devil sees a new plaything.

data.name: Repository Skaab
data.oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Repository Skaab exploits a creature, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Created to capture the spark of genius for later use.

data.name: Rot-Tide Gargantua
data.oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rot-Tide Gargantua exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
data.flavor_text: Now that it doesn't need to breathe, its hunting ground extends well beyond the sea.

data.name: Rural Recruit
data.oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Rural Recruit enters the battlefield, create a 3/1 green Boar creature token.
data.flavor_text: The Dawnhart survivors welcome recruits of all shapes and sizes.

data.name: Sanctify
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Olivia Voldaren has faith only in herself. We answer to a higher calling."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

data.name: Scattered Thoughts
data.oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: Stitchers delegate the most important tasks to assistants with a good eye for detail.

data.name: Selhoff Entomber
data.oracle_text: {T}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: It knows one fundamental truth: bodies belong in graves.

data.name: Serpentine Ambush
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.
data.flavor_text: The merchant did guarantee the new bait would bring in something big.

data.name: Sheltering Boughs
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Sheltering Boughs enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
data.flavor_text:
"We're not at odds with the woods. How could we be, when we share so many enemies?"
—Marel, Dawnhart witch

data.name: Sigarda's Imprisonment
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{4}{W}: Exile enchanted creature. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

data.name: Skywarp Skaab
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Skywarp Skaab enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"If I wanted all the parts to match, I wouldn't have become a stitcher."
—Barton, stitcher

data.name: Snarling Wolf
data.oracle_text: {1}{G}: Snarling Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Oh, thank the angels. It's not a werewolf, just a regular wo—"
—Bruno, Ulvenwald guide, last words

data.name: Sporeback Wolf
data.oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Sporeback Wolf gets +0/+2.
data.flavor_text: The mushrooms growing in the wolves' fur possess curative properties incredible enough to tempt many alchemists into risking their lives to track one down.

data.name: Spore Crawler
data.oracle_text: When Spore Crawler dies, draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Remember to come back in a few years when that fungus has died off. Then we'll see what's in the chest."
—Old Rutstein

data.name: Steelclad Spirit
data.oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Steelclad Spirit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
data.flavor_text: Some geists imitate the lives they left behind. Others follow the dreams they never realized.

data.name: Stitched Assistant
data.oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Stitched Assistant exploits a creature, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

data.name: Supernatural Rescue
data.oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as you control a Spirit.
When you cast this spell, tap up to two target creatures you don't control.
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

data.name: Sure Strike
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Before the officiant even had a chance to ask if anyone objected to the Voldaren-Markov union, Arlinn made her opinion known.

data.name: Syncopate
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Fool! Can't you see the tide has turned against you?"

data.name: Syphon Essence
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.

data.name: Toxic Scorpion
data.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Toxic Scorpion enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"You want that venom? Collect it yourself! I'm not losing another pair of dragonhide gloves."
—Old Rutstein

data.name: Traveling Minister
data.oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. You gain 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: Priests of the Sigardian Sect travel to the farthest reaches to spread hope and healing, even in the darkest times.

data.name: Undying Malice
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
data.flavor_text: Few take kindly to being put in their place, especially if their place is the grave.

data.name: Unhallowed Phalanx
data.oracle_text: Unhallowed Phalanx enters the battlefield tapped.
data.flavor_text:
"In case any of you new recruits were wondering, this is why we don't use mass graves anymore."
—Kerren of the Mausoleum Guards

data.name: Unholy Officiant
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Unholy Officiant.
data.flavor_text:
"Is this twisted ceremony simply a mockery of the human rite, or has Olivia fallen for her own charade?"
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Vampire's Kiss
data.oracle_text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: Young vampires gorge themselves at every meal, but their elders have learned to savor the smallest bite.

data.name: Vampire Slayer
data.oracle_text: Whenever Vampire Slayer deals damage to a Vampire, destroy that creature.
data.flavor_text: When Kaya saved her village, Berit realized even vampires could be killed. When she brought one down herself, she realized she had found her calling.

data.name: Voldaren Epicure
data.oracle_text: When Voldaren Epicure enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: "If you're not refining your tastes, what's the point of living forever?"

data.name: Wanderlight Spirit
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Wanderlight Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
data.flavor_text: The towers and catwalks of the Voldaren fortress are lit by the lanterns of geists endlessly seeking a way out.

card_faces.name: Weary Prisoner
card_faces.oracle_text:
Defender
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "Your guard attacked me. He got what was coming to him."

card_faces.name: Wrathful Jailbreaker
card_faces.oracle_text:
Wrathful Jailbreaker attacks each combat if able.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)

card_faces.name: Weaver of Blossoms
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

card_faces.name: Blossom-Clad Werewolf
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . does not always mean living in peace.

data.name: Wedding Invitation
data.oracle_text:
When Wedding Invitation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice Wedding Invitation: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. If it's a Vampire, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: RSVP at your own risk.

data.name: Witch's Web
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it.
data.flavor_text: Ever since the ritual, Ryla didn't have an appetite at the dinner table, but her long walks in the forest always seemed to satiate her hunger.

data.name: Wolf Strike
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn if it's night. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
data.flavor_text: Tovolar's howlpack had scattered, but the Dire-Strain survivors were still on the hunt.

data.name: Wretched Throng
data.oracle_text: When Wretched Throng dies, you may search your library for a card named Wretched Throng, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
data.flavor_text:
"Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Oh no, again!"
—Beltstad, cathar recruit, last words
